importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The incident occurred on a Saturday in Bladensburg, Maryland, and the news was reported on Sunday, October 19, 2025, indicating the timeline of the event and public response.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The incident happened at an unspecified time on a Saturday, with emergency response and public awareness beginning early Sunday morning, and the article was updated at 3:23 PM EDT, showing the timeline of response and reporting.

keyTakeAways: A 66-year-old man from Washington, DC, drove into a birthday party tent in Bladensburg, Maryland, killing one person and injuring 13 others.
The victim who died was Ashley Hernandez Gutierrez, 31, of Washington.
The suspect initially fled the scene on foot but later turned himself in to authorities.
The incident occurred at a child birthday party, with victims ranging in age from 1 to 17 years old, including six adults and eight children.
Neighbors reported hearing loud booms, seeing a car driving erratically, and witnessing children being injured, with some being pinned under the vehicle.
A video posted on X shows police and firefighters at the scene, with the tent partially collapsed.
All victims were taken to hospitals; one child remains in stable condition, three adult victims are hospitalized in stable condition, one adult is awaiting treatment, and one adult has been released.
Jocelyn Route, a former Prince George’s County school board member and Bladensburg council member, provided firsthand accounts of the crash from her home.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 66-year-old man from Washington, DC, plowed into a birthday party tent in Bladensburg, Maryland, killing 31-year-old Ashley Hernandez Gutierrez and injuring 13 others, including children as young as one year old. The suspect initially fled the scene on foot but later turned himself in. Neighbors reported hearing loud noises and seeing a car driving erratically, and eyewitness Jocelyn Route, a former school board and council member, described the scene, including pinned victims and children being rescued. Emergency responders found the tent torn open and partially collapsed. All victims were taken to hospitals; one child remains in stable condition, while three adults are hospitalized and one has been released. The incident has been widely reported by national media, including CNN, and public video footage on X has amplified awareness of the tragedy.
title: Driver plows into child’s birthday party in Maryland, killing 1 and injuring 13, turns himself in
